item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Caring for yourself while caring for others (85 points | 2 comments)
2. Starship's Sixth Flight Test (230 points | 197 comments)
3. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (226 points | 90 comments)
4. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (164 points | 55 comments)
5. Launch HN: Midship (YC S24) – Turn PDFs and Images into usable data (29 points | 23 comments)
6. Show HN: SuperSplat – open-source 3D Gaussian Splat Editor (159 points | 40 comments)
7. New images of Jupiter (369 points | 56 comments)
8. Useful built-in macOS command-line utilities (612 points | 176 comments)
9. WebSockets cost us $1M on our AWS bill (146 points | 66 comments)
10. The Decline of the Working Musician (27 points | 6 comments)
11. Exposure to phthalate compromises brain function in adult vertebrates (11 points | 1 comment)
12. Model Predictive Control in the Browser with WebAssembly (70 points | 8 comments)
13. Title drops in movies (445 points | 143 comments)
14. Solving the Siberian Crater Mystery (15 points | 2 comments)
15. Learning not to trust the All-In podcast (223 points | 85 comments)
16. Monorepo – Our Experience (78 points | 80 comments)

18. Forget CDK and AWS's insane costs. Pulumi and DigitalOcean to the rescue (25 points | 1 comment)
19. Switch 2 will be backwards compatible with Switch (208 points | 132 comments)
20. Trump wins presidency for second time (1447 points | 6549 comments)
21. Kernel optimization with BOLT (binary optimization and layout tool) (113 points | 12 comments)
22. 98.css – A design system for building faithful recreations of old UIs (323 points | 75 comments)
23. Only 5.3% of US welders are women. After years as a professor, I became one (223 points | 311 comments)
24. German Government Collapses (8 points | discuss)
25. 3D Rotation Design (79 points | 17 comments)
26. The truth about latchkey kids (21 points | 17 comments)
27. Physicists Spot Quantum Tornadoes Twirling in a 'Supersolid' (7 points | discuss)
28. Upcoming changes to the DNSSEC root trust anchor (82 points | 23 comments)
29. Powering the Mars Base (83 points | 67 comments)
30. Hacking cars in JavaScript (Replay attacks in the browser with the HackRF) (22 points | 1 comment)
